properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM REVIEW JOIN REGISTER USING(REG_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM REGISTER WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND REG_STA = 2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, C.* FROM ( SELECT REG_NO , TEACH_DATE , REG_STA , CL_THUMB , C.CL_NAME "CL_NAME" , S.START_TIME "START_TIME" , D.DISTR_NAME "DISTR_NAME" FROM REGISTER R LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS C ON C.CL_NO = R.CL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN DISTRICT D ON D.DISTR_CODE = C.DISTR_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON S.SCH_NO = R.SCH_NO WHERE R.MEM_NO = ? AND REG_STA = 2 AND RE_ENROLL = 'N' ORDER BY REG_NO DESC )C ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM REVIEW WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND RE_STA = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT CONTENT , RE_STAR , RE_DATE , C.CL_NAME "CL_NAME" , C.CL_THUMB "CL_THUMB" FROM REVIEW R LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS C ON C.CL_NO = R.CL_NO WHERE R.MEM_NO = ? AND RE_STA = 'Y' ORDER BY RE_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RE_NO , "CONTENT" , RE_STAR , RE_DATE , RE_UPDATE , RE_STA , REG_NO , R.CL_NO , R.MEM_NO , CL_NAME , M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_PROFILE FROM REVIEW R JOIN CLASS C ON (R.CL_NO = C.CL_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE C.MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE REVIEW SET RE_STA = 'N' WHERE RE_NO = ?

SELECT REG_NO , TEACH_DATE , REG_STA , CL_THUMB , C.CL_NAME "CL_NAME" , S.START_TIME "START_TIME" , D.DISTR_NAME "DISTR_NAME" FROM REGISTER R LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS C ON C.CL_NO = R.CL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN DISTRICT D ON D.DISTR_CODE = C.DISTR_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON S.SCH_NO = R.SCH_NO WHERE REG_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RE_NO , CONTENT , RE_STAR , RE_DATE , MEM_NAME , C.MEM_NO , C.CL_NAME , TT_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN TUTOR T ON(C.MEM_NO = T.MEM_NO) ORDER BY RE_NO DESC ) WHERE 1=1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RE_NO , CONTENT , RE_STAR , RE_DATE , MEM_NAME , C.MEM_NO , C.CL_NAME FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) ORDER BY RE_NO DESC )

SELECT RE_NO , CONTENT , CL_NAME , CT_NAME , MEM_NAME , RE_STAR , RE_DATE , RE_UPDATE , DECODE(RE_STA, 'Y', '등록', 'N', '삭제') "RE_STA" , TT_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN TUTOR T ON(C.MEM_NO = T.MEM_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE RE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REVIEW ( RE_NO , CONTENT , RE_STAR , REG_NO , CL_NO , MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RVNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , REF_TYPE , REF_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , 2 , SEQ_RVNO.CURRVAL )
